amendment.description: Amendment prohibits support to and participation in the Saudi-led coalitions military operations against the Houthis in Yemen.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 26 printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 to prohibit support to and participation in the Saudi-led coalitions military operations against the Houthis in Yemen.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (WA) amendment (A018) Agreed to by recorded vote: 240 - 185 (Roll no. 450).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (WA) amendment (A018) Agreed to by recorded vote: 240 - 185 (Roll no. 450).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Smith (WA).
